title: MsuConfig
description: Config file for msu track names, responses for when asking about a song, and various tracker responses to songs playing

TrackLocations.description: Names for various tracks when asking "what's the current song for"

CurrentSong.description:
Gets the phrases for what song is playing 
{0} is a placeholder for the song details

CurrentMsu.description:
Gets the phrases for what msu the current song is from 
{0} is a placeholder for the msu details

UnknownSong.description: Gets the phrases for not being able to determine the playing song

SongResponses.description: Responses to songs, either by song number, msu name, or song name

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.
